title: Please help me identify this font (distinct lowercase r)
content:
From the blog [http://www.houseofearnest.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014220607/http:/www.houseofearnest.com/ "http://www.houseofearnest.com/")

the words "house" "of" "welcome"

I have also attached two screenshots Picture 9: the word "About" , Picture 10: the word "floors" which has the distinct lowercase "r".

Thank you.
